#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,a,b,i,maxi,n,base,num1,num2,mul;
	char s1[6],s2[6];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		n=strlen(s1);
		maxi=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			maxi=max(maxi,s1[i]-'0');
		base=maxi+1;
		num1=0;
		mul=1;
		for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			num1=num1+(s1[i]-'0')*mul;
			mul=mul*base;
		}
		n=strlen(s2);
		maxi=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			maxi=max(maxi,s2[i]-'0');
		base=maxi+1;
		num2=0;
		mul=1;
		for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			num2=num2+(s2[i]-'0')*mul;
			mul=mul*base;
		}
		printf("%d\n",num1+num2);
	}
	return 0;
}
